items.sentence: Discipline is the most important component of success.
Do we really want Tom to know how much money you make?
Does Tom think that he\'ll be in Australia all summer?
Give me your word that you won\'t tell Tom about this.
You had better get in touch with your parents at once.
Tom and Mary have been married for almost three years.
Can Tom really speak French as well as he says he can?
I was lucky that I was able to find a good babysitter.
Is there anywhere special in Australia you want to go?
Listen carefully and do exactly what I tell you to do.
